cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.LG, cs.CC, cs.SI. 

The paper deals with distribution testing, which is a topic in information theory (cs.IT) and machine learning (cs.LG). The use of non-adaptive conditional samples is a specific technique in distribution testing, which falls under the category of algorithms and data structures (cs.DS). The paper also involves complexity analysis, which is a topic in computational complexity (cs.CC). Finally, the paper's focus on reducing the problem from $\ell_1$-testing to $\ell_\infty$-testing suggests that it may also fall under the category of signal processing (cs.SI).
